explains: vt. 任命某人为牧师；授某人以圣职；（上帝、法律等）命令；注定

sentences.en: Do for Aaron and his sons everything I have commanded you, taking seven days to ordain them.
sentences.cn: 你要照我一切所吩咐的，向亚伦和他儿子行承接圣职的礼七天。

sentences.en: And so ordain I in all churches.
sentences.cn: 我吩咐各教会都是这样。

sentences.en: Please ordain me a Bhikkhu so that I can develop the Noble Eightfold Path.
sentences.cn: 请给我授戒让我成为比丘，这样我就能够修行八正道。
